I am too intrested in making my own box.=A0I=A0recieved my Radio Shack Elec=
tronics Learning Lab just a last week from EBay http://cgi.ebay.com/BRAND-N=
EW-ELECTRONICS-LEARNING-LAB-RADIO-SHACK-28-280_W0QQitemZ150404642293QQcmdZV=
iewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=3Ditem2304d0b5f5#shId.
I believe I can =
learn electronics using this kit and YouTube videos.
I am following a video=
 lesson course on how to use the Electronics leaning Lab on YouTube Here's =
the Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DxGHjd88ASNM&feature=3Dfvw
I hope=
 using this electronics kit I can learn to make a box out of it so anyone w=
ho knows electronics or this kit will believe and can make something like a=
 ghost radio box. I also believe I can try to make a few different boxs out=
 of this kit. But does anyone have the diagrames? or the chips/parts? Video=
s on how too are good also.

I also would like to try to make my Eletronics=
 learning Lab into a free energy device. Does any one have any plans on tha=
t?
Here's a YouTube video on that: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DEe9uYqF=
b-OI

Thanks.
